The Zora along Zora River have been

The prince is waiting over at

Me, I'm a peddler, so I'm free to go
where the wind takes me. Or the waves.
Or whatever. Yeaaah.
Oh, let me introduce myself.


I'm Douma. Nice to meetcha!

column3:
ウチ そのシド王子とやらに会ったんやけど
アレは…アカン奴や
ウチのこと見て「ずっと見ていたゾ！」とか
「君の名は？」とか聞いてきよるねん！
だから ここまで逃げて来てんけど…

まぁ…アンタも
怖い物見たさにシド王子見てきてみ？
男やったら ナンパはされんと思うけど…
column4:
Yeah, I met that so-called Prince Sidon.
Thing is...he ain't no good. First thing
he says to me, he says...
\"I've been watching you!\" and then he
says, \"What's your name?!\" Can you
believe that heat? I don't need it!
So I ran away from him and all that noise.
Now here I am.

So yeah... If you want to see a freak
show, go visit that Prince Sidon.

Though I doubt he'll go for you since
you're not a looker like me.

column3:
そんなことより アンタ
さっき そこのゾーラと話しとったやろ？
column4:
In any case, I wanted to ask you
somethin'... You just spoke to that
Zora over there, yeah?

column3:
あのゾーラ…ゾーラの里方面に行って
シド王子に会ってくれ！とか言うてたやろ？
column4:
And that Zora...told you to head toward
Zora's Domain to meet Prince Sidon,
that right?

column3:
なんで嘘つくねん！
あのゾーラの声 ここまで聞こえてきたで？
column4:
Hey, don't lie! That's cold! I could hear
that Zora's voice from here, ya know!

column3:
だから なんでしょうもない嘘つくねん！
全部聞こえとったわ！
column4:
Why are you lying about it, fiend?!
I heard the whole thing!

column3: まぁ とにかく…よ
column4: In any case... Listen up.

column3:

ゾーラの里方面に行くんか？

column4:

you'll probably be fine.

Just watch out for a creepy guy calling
himself a prince.

column3:
そうやなぁ…自分でプリンス言うてる時点で

column4:
Yeah, I wouldn't head that way.
I just came from there, and I ran into
this shady guy calling himself a prince.
This world we live in...

column3: こっちこっち～
column4: Over here!

column3:
私は ゾーラ族のタッカと申す者！

おぬし ハイリア人ではないか？

ハイリア人だろう？いや間違いなく ハイリア人である！実は今 ゾーラ族の王子…
シド様が訳あってハイリア人を探しておられる
今は何も聞かずシド王子のおわすダルブル橋に
会いに行ってもらえぬだろうか？
無理にとは言わん

column4:
I'm Tottika of the Zora!


Aren't you...a Hylian?


You ARE, aren't you?!Yes, I can tell! You are most
certainly a Hylian!As fate would have it, our Prince Sidon
is looking for a Hylian like you.

The prince is at Inogo Bridge right now.
Will you consent to go and see him?

I mean, you don't have to if you don't
want to...

Though...I'd kind of like you to go even if you
don't want to...

column3:
やぁ！ハイリア人！

お主を猛者と見込んで
お頼み申し上げる
ダルブル橋にシド王子が おられるので
会いに行ってはくれぬか！
column4:
Hey! Hylian!


I see that you are a skilled warrior.
I would like to request something
of you.
Prince Sidon is waiting at Inogo Bridge.
Please, go and see him!

column3:
シド王子のおられるダルブル橋は向こう！

ここから東のゾーラ川の上流
あの塔の近くである！
column4:
Prince Sidon is at Inogo Bridge,
just over there!

He is upstream on the Zora River,
which lies to the east of here.
You will find him near that tower!

決めた！

無理にでも行ってくれ！

column3: ふんふふ～ん♪
column4: ♪La dee daaa!♪

column3:
突然 お呼び止めして すみません！

私は ゾーラ族の

あなたを ハイリア人と お見受けして

今 ちょっとだけ よろしいですか？
column4:
I apologize for calling on you
so suddenly!

I am Ledo, a proud member of the
distinguished Zora.

As you are a real Hylian, I had no choice
but to call upon you!

Will you please spare me a moment
of your time?

column3:

見えるでありますか？
あの塔の北側を流れるゾーラ川の上流…
ダルブル橋に行って欲しいのであります
column4:
Do you see that tower...the one atop
that mountain yonder?

I need you to go upstream of Zora River,
which runs along the north side of
that tower...to Inogo Bridge.

column3:
…

今 あなた
「なんでオレが？」って思いましたね
まぁ誰だって通りすがりのゾーラに いきなり
こんなこと言われたら そう思いますよね
でも コレあなたにとって
絶対お得な話であります！
なんと ゾーラ族のシド王子が
強いハイリア人を探しているのであります
シド王子のお願いですから おそらく褒美も…

なのでゾーラ川の上流ダルブル橋の
シド王子を訪ねてほしいのであります！
column4:
...


I can see it in your eyes. You're asking
yourself, \"Why me?\"

A reasonable question for a stranger
accosted by a passing Zora in such
a manner.
But I must assure you, this venture will
be very profitable for you as well!

You see, Prince Sidon of the Zora is in
desperate search of a strong Hylian.

And as this is a royal request from the
prince himself, it's safe to assume a
generous reward is in the cards...
That is why I am asking you to meet with
Prince Sidon at Inogo Bridge, along the
Zora River just upstream of here.

ハイリア人の…

Hylian...

きっと あなたにとっても お得な話であります！

As this is a request from Prince Sidon...
I am certain something good will come

Please, you must promise to meet with

It's terribly urgent!

ねぇねぇ ハイリア人っ！

シド王子はゾーラ川の上流

Prince Sidon is waiting upstream of

Now go! Yes, and listen to what

ハイリア人ですわよね！ ヒレがないですもの

column4:
I knew it! You are a Hylian, aren't you?!
Yes, you must be a Hylian! Otherwise
you're one unfortunate-looking Zora!
Well, your timing couldn't be more
perfect if you tried!

I was ordered by Prince Sidon to find
a Hylian!

I've been searching nonstop! Yes, quite!


I certainly wasn't just floating around
and splashing in the water for fun!

column3:
ハイリア人のお方…

我らがシド王子の場所
もう一度説明致しましょうか？
column4:
Hylian!


Shall I explain where you can find

シド王子は我らゾーラ族王家のご子息

ダルブル橋でお待ちなの…
行ってみてくださらない？
column4:
Prince Sidon is a member of the
distinguished Zora royal family.

He's waiting at Inogo Bridge, which is on
the other side of that tall tower.

I do hope you'll agree to go there
and meet with him.

column3:
シド王子なら あちらにある高い塔の向こう側
ダルブル橋に おられますわ
column4:
Prince Sidon is at Inogo Bridge,
which is on the other side of that
tall tower over there.

column3:
あ…突然のことでビックリされましたよね

ごめんなさい
でも私たちゾーラ族にとって一大事なんですの
どうか私のお願いを聞いてくださいな
あと もしシド王子と会っても…
私がここで水遊びしてたって
言わないでくださいね
column4:
Ah, yes... You must be taken aback by
such a sudden request.

My apologies. For us Zora, this is our
top priority right now.

So I must beg you to grant my request.
Oh, and...if you do meet Prince Sidon...

Perhaps don't tell him I was splashing
about and playing in the water. Deal?

column3:
それではシド王子を…
お願いしますね
column4:
OK then. Please make your way to
Prince Sidon!

column3: あっ！ そこの人！
column4: Ah! You there!

column3: こっち！ こっちー！
column4: Over here! Over heeere!!

column3:
ですから お願いします
シド王子の元へ…行っていただけないかしら
あと もしシド王子と会っても
私が水遊びしてたって言わないでくださいね
column4:
Please... If you do not mind... Will you go
and meet with Prince Sidon?

Oh! And if you do meet Prince Sidon,
please don't tell him I was splashing
about and playing in the water. Deal?

column3: る～♪ るる～♪
column4: ♪Laaaa! La la laaa!♪

column3:
うゎおっ！ビックリした！おほんッ失礼！
小生はゾーラ族の ノールという者だ
貴殿は旅の方と お見受けしたが
なぜ こんなところに…？
column4:
WOW! I cannot believe it!*ahem* Excuse me! Yes, you!
I am Gruve of the Zora!

It is apparent that you are a traveler,
but may I ask what brought you here?

column3:
ふぉ ふぉっ？！

今小生を押そうとした？してない？！

…まあよい
column4:
Ha ha! You... Did you just try to
push me? No, I assume?

Well, in any case...

column3:
シド王子"見つけましたー！

ハイリア人が ここにおりますー！

…

……
column4:
Prince Sidon! I found one!


I FOUND A HYLIAN!!


...

シド王子"ハイリア人ですー！

ノールも ここにおりますよー！

た…助けてくだされー！
column4:
Prince Sidon! I got a Hylian!


And I, Gruve, am here as well!


Help me! PLEASE!!

column3:
ふぉっ…"鋭い！
鋭過ぎる質問でございますな！
実は小生…里のシド王子と一緒に とある事情で
ハイリア人を探しておったのですが
うっかり昼寝してしまいすごい音と振動で
起こされたと思ったら こんな所に…
下に降りたいのだが高過ぎて
どうしたものか思案していた次第…
なんとか この下の橋におられるシド王子に
気づいてもらいたいのだが…
…と言うか貴殿！ハイリア人では？！

なんと！これは幸い！
column4:
Hm... How very astute of you!
An excellent query indeed!

I, by order of Prince Sidon of Zora's
Domain, am searching for a Hylian.
Or I was...but then I fell asleep.
I awoke to a loud noise and awful
quaking, and now here I am.

I'd like to get down and be on my way,
but I'm simply too high up! I need to
figure something out.
Prince Sidon is down at the bridge
below, but for some reason I cannot
seem to catch his attention!
But you! You are a Hylian, yes?!


Well then! My luck is improving!

column3:
う～む…やはりシド王子は
小生の事に気づいておられない様子…
こうなったら思い切って
下の川に飛び込んでみるべきか？
そうすればシド王子の元に行ける…

…

……

イヤ イヤ イヤッ！この高さ！

シド王子の お側に行く前に
天国に行ってしまうわ！
column4:
Hmm... Prince Sidon doesn't seem to
notice my struggle...

Perhaps I should swallow my fear and
jump to the river below. Then I could
return to him! He must be worried sick.
...


...


No! Nope! Can't do it! I'm too high up.


I'll likely meet the gods of the ever after
before I ever see Prince Sidon again...

column3:
ハイリア人よ すまない… 

小生シド王子の元にたどり着くのに
時間がかかりそうでな…
小生の事は放っておいて先に行ってくれ…
column4:
Mr. Hylian, I must apologize... 


It will be some time before I can get back
to Prince Sidon. Please, you must leave
me here and go on ahead.

column3:
シド王子には小生が なんとか
お伝えしておきますゆえ…
column4:
I will find a way to get my message of
distress to him... Or so I hope.

column3: たっ高い…
column4: So high up...

column3: ふ… ふぉっ…
column4: Uuuuhhh...

column3:
おお！ありがたい！
お前 ハイリア人だな？
column4:
Oh, my, how wonderful!
You are a Hylian, yes?

column3: よしよし！ツイてるツイてる！
column4: Perfect! It must be my lucky day!

column3:
違わないだろう！
どう見ても お前はハイリア人だ！
column4:
Oh, stop it! I know a Hylian when I see

column3:
あぁ…いきなりゴメン

アタシ ゾーラ族のトルフォー！
ずっと お前のようなハイリア人を探してた！
実は アタシ達のゾーラの里が
おかしな事になっててね…
だからアタシ達シド王子と一緒に
強そうなハイリア人を探してたんだ
column4:
Oh... *ahem* I apologize for calling out
to you so suddenly.

I am Torfeau of the Zora. I have been
searching for a Hylian like you for a
very long time!
My home, Zora's Domain, is in terrible
danger. That is why Prince Sidon sent
me in search of a strong Hylian warrior.

column3:
そのシド王子なら あのダルブル橋に居る

アタシらを助けると思って
一度シド王子の話を聞いてくれないか？
column4:
Prince Sidon is waiting at Inogo Bridge.


Would you please talk to the prince
and perhaps save us all? We would
be ever so grateful!

column3:
頼む！
アタシらを助けると思って
column4:
Please! Consider how nice it would feel
to know you saved us all!

column3:
詳しくはダルブル橋に居る
シド王子を訪ねてくれないか？
column4:
Go to Inogo Bridge and talk to Prince
Sidon for more information!

column3: ハイリア人！
column4: A Hylian!

column3: おおッ！
column4: Whoa!

column3: 待っていたゾ リンク！
column4: I've been waiting for you, Link!

column3:
ようこそ！
我がゾーラの里へ！
さあ キングに紹介しよう！
こちらに来てくれ！
column4:
Welcome! Behold the pride of my people,
Zora's Domain! Now I shall introduce you
to the king. Hurry, this way!

column3: おぉッ！
column4: Whoa!

column3:
そっと後ろから近付かれると驚くじゃないか！！
…だが
column4:
I did not expect you to walk so closely
behind me! Indeed, you gave me a fright.
However...

column3: おーい！ リンク！
column4: HEY! Link!!

column3:
川の中からで すまない！強引に誘ったので君が本当に来てくれるのか
心配だったんだが順調のようで安心したゾ！
最近の異変以来 ここにも魔物が増えている！
注意して進んでくれよ！！
ゾーラ族の皆が君を待ってるゾ！！
column4:
Sorry for calling out to you from
the river!Since I pressured you into coming, I was
not sure you would really come through.
I am pleased things are going well.
Ever since this strange occurrence,
there have been a lot of monsters
around here. Be careful as you proceed!
And hurry! All of my fellow
Zora are anxiously awaiting
your arrival!

column3:
おーい！
こっちだ こっち！
column4: HEY! Over here!

column3:
遠くからで すまない！
里まで まだ遠いが とてもいいペースだゾ！
川の中から応援しているから
がんばってくれ！
君なら きっと辿りつけるゾ！
column4:
Sorry for calling from so far away!
The domain is still a ways off,
but you're making good progress!
I shall be along soon myself.
I won't be much longer!

In the meantime, I'll be cheering you on
from here in the river, so hang in there!

You can do it! Stay strong!

column3: おおッ！ リンクッ！
column4: Hey! Link!!

column3:
そろそろ里まで半分のところまで来たゾ！

この先に少し魔物が多い場所があるが
きっと大丈夫だろう！
俺はリンクを信じているゾ！
column4:
You're almost halfway to Zora's Domain!


Oh, by the way, there are a few spots up
ahead with lots of enemies...but I'm sure
you will be fine!
I believe in you, Link!

column3:
おーい！ リンク！

下だッ！ こっちだー！
column4:
Hey! Link!!


Look below! Down here!

column3:
かなり遠いな！
でも必ずこの橋を通ると思って待っていた！
もうすぐでゾーラの里に着く！オレも先に行って待っているからな
里で会おうッ！
column4:
You are still pretty far off, my friend!
But I was sure you'd be passing over this
bridge, so I have been waiting for you.
You will be in Zora's Domain before you
know it!In fact, I'm going to head that way too!
I shall meet you there!

column3:
…っと！ リンク！背後から魔物が迫っているぞ！
気を付けるんだッ！
column4:
Whoa! Link!!Beware, warrior! A monster approaches
from behind you!

column3: おおッ！ やっぱりハイリア人なんだな！！
column4: Aha! A Hylian! Yes, I knew it!

column3:
おお！ やはりな！！これでも オレはゾーラ族の王子
人を見る目には自信があるのだゾ！
column4:
Aha! Just as I suspected!I am a Zora prince, after all. I have an
eye for talent that is unparalleled!

column3:
いやッ！"謙遜するな！オレにはわかる これでもゾーラ族の王子
人を見る目には自信があるのだゾ！
column4:
No, no, no!
Do not be so humble!I can tell just by looking at you. I am a
Zora prince, after all. I have an eye for
talent that is unparalleled!

column3:
良いゾ！"最高だゾッ！オレは ずっと探していたのだ！
リンクのような強きオーラを放つ男を！
今 ゾーラの里は"水の神獣ヴァ・ルッタによる
大雨で"存続の危機に見舞われてる！
助けてくれ！"君の力が必要なんだ！！どうかゾーラの里まで来てくれまいか？
column4:
Yes! Exquisite!I have been searching for someone like
you for a long while. A man like you,
Link, who carries himself with power!
Right now, Zora's Domain is in grave
danger because of the massive rainfall
coming from Divine Beast Vah Ruta!
Please, promise you will help us!
We need your strength, warrior!Won't you please come to 
Zora's Domain with me?

column3: おおッ！"本当か！
column4: Wow! Really?!

column3:
ちょっと？……“ちょっと” というのは これくらいか？
よしッ！ じゃあ協力してくれるな！
column4:
Think on it?...
...Was that sufficient time to think? Surely.
So let's get to work!

column3:
オレは キミの行く先に異変が無いか
先に行って確認する
では頼んだゾ！！
column4:
I shall go on ahead and make sure there
is not anything strange going on where
you are headed. I'm counting on you!

column3: リンク？！リンクか！"良い名だゾ！
column4:
Link?Your name is Link?! What a
fantastic name!

column3:
ありがとう リンク！
君は やはりオレの思った通りの男だゾ！
これでゾーラの里は救われた！
早速里に向かってくれ！
column4:
Thank you, Link! You are indeed
the man I thought you were!

Now Zora's Domain will be saved for
certain! No time to waste! Hurry up
and head over!

column3:
川を遡る事ができない ハイリア人の君には
里までは厳しい道のりになるだろう
column4:
As a Hylian, I know you are unable to
swim up the river. As such, the path to
the domain may be a bit treacherous.

column3:
大雨が降っているせいで崖は濡れて登れないが
ここを真っ直ぐ道に沿って進めば里に着くゾ！
column4:
Because of the rain, the cliffs are too wet
to climb. To reach the domain, you will
need to go straight along this path.

column3: 君の名は？名を聞かせてくれ！！
column4: And what is your name?Go on, please tell me!

column3: がんばってくれ！
column4: Don't give up! I believe in you!

column3: オレはシド！ ゾーラ族の王子だ！
column4: I am Sidon, the Zora prince!

column3:
実は少し前から ずっと君を見ていたのだその身のこなし
全身から漂う只者でないオーラ！
リンク！
君は ハイリアの強い戦士なんだろう？！
column4:
To be honest, I've been watching you.I've seen the way you work. I can tell by
how you carry yourself that you are no
ordinary person.
Link! You must be a strong warrior
among the Hylians, correct?!

column3: おっと失礼…
column4: Oh, pardon me...

column3: どこかで聞いた事がある気もするが…
column4:
Hmm, though I cannot shake the feeling
that I have heard it somewhere before...

column3: とにかく良い名だゾ！
column4: Well, in any case, it is a strong name!

column3:
……

ああ！ そうだ！ 
渡す物があるんだったゾ！
column4:
...


Oh! That's right! I have something that
I would like to give to you!

column3:
これは オレからの 
ささやかな応援の気持ちだ！
column4:
This is just a small trinket to show that
I have faith in you.

column3: 電気への抵抗力を上げる薬だゾ！
column4:
It is a drink that will increase your
resistance to electricity!

column3:
ハイリア人用の薬だからか
オレたちには効き目が薄かったが 
キミには効果があると思うゾ！
column4:
I am not sure why, but its effects do not
seem to work for Zora. Perhaps because
it was made specifically for Hylians.
It should work wonders for you, though!

column3:
この先にいる電気を使うマモノにも
苦戦するかもしれないが
column4:
You likely have a tough fight in store—
there are monsters up ahead that attack
with electricity.

column3: そこの君！
column4: You there!
